//GasBill Enter Bill Group Number Bill Group Number Firstly, I created a main layout (vertical) as you see in the code. Then, for each one of the checkboxes I created a horizontal layout. In this case you can play with the colors and fonts of the elements (checkboxes, items, and etc.). I hope it helps.
